text: Leessang (Hangul: 리쌍; stylized as LeeSsang) is a South Korean Hip-hop duo, composed of Kang Hee-gun ("Garie") and Gil Seong-joon ("Gil"). ==Members== Garie *Birthname: Kang Hee-gun (Hangul: 강희건) *Date of Birth: *Height: *Position: Rapper, Leader Gil *Birthname: Gil Seong-joon (Hangul: 길성준) *Date of Birth: *Height: *Position: Vocalist ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== Album Information Tracklist Leessang Of Honey Family"Leessang Of Honey Family', Naver.
